title: No Fee 1bd/1bath w Balcony in new amenities building off the L
posting_body: ['Brand new building located on a tree lined  block on the Bushwick – Ridgewood border.', 'New building features 19 beautiful units:', 'Garden duplexes with finished basements and private backyard, one and two bedroom apartments—a few with private balconies, and two one bedroom penthouses with private balcony and private rooftops.', 'Come tour and take your pick!', 'Apartments feature:', '~State of the art kitchen with all new stainless steel appliances, dishwasher/microwave and island bar (in some units)', '~Newly tiled bathrooms with deep tub, and rain shower head,', '~Queen sized bedroom with great closet space', '~Hardwood floors', '~High ceilings', '~Central AC', '~Laundry room in building', '~Video intercom/virtual doorman', '~North/South facing windows with tons of natural light!', '~Beautiful shared rooftop', '~Parking spaces available', '~Gym', '~Storage spaces available', 'Across the street from the L train at Halsey St', 'Nearby shops, restaurants and bars including Evil Twin Brewery, Cafe Rum, Pan, Prime Food, Golden Thai, and so much more!', '1 Month concession!!', '$2500-$4000', '(Taking offers)', '12 Month leases', 'Pets OK!', 'No fee!', 'Guarantors welcome', 'Income 40x', 'Credit 700+', 'Email , Call/Text Genesis 6469669972', '(Licensed Real Estate Agent)']
